page.title: 19The Fun Run,Stevenage 1985
page.content: Sunday,May 5th,1985 was{Fun Run Day. It was held at{Fairlands Valley Park, Stevenage to provide vital medical equipment for a landrover to be sent to{ETHIOPIA}.There were 3996 people in the races altogether.The total amount of money raised was{Â£3000}.Some people dressed up in fancy dress;and at the end of their race,each runner got some {Coca Cola and a box of chocolates. While I was running my sister and her boyfriend were cheering me on.I came twentieth in my age group out of three hundred and fifty in my race.I was really tired when I finished the race.For the{ETHIOPIANS}I collected Â£12 sponsorship money.
